people.title: Manage Conflict
people.primeDirective: Facilitate, donâ€™t dictate. Resolve at the source.
people.deepDive: PMI views conflict as an opportunity for growth. Distinguish between 'Functional' and 'Dysfunctional' conflict.
people.veteranTip: In 16 years, I've found that technical 'disagreements' are often just lack of role clarity. Check the RACI matrix first.

learnMore.logic: IF technical, THEN use 'Collaborating'. IF personal, THEN refer to 'Team Charter'.

people.title: Lead a Team
people.primeDirective: Servant Leadership: You are the blocker-remover.
people.deepDive: Adopt situational leadership based on Tuckman's Model (Forming to Performing).
people.veteranTip: Don't fall into the 'Expert Trap.' Your job isn't to be the smartest person in the room; it's to make the room smart enough to solve the problem.

learnMore.logic: IF 'Storming', THEN re-establish ground rules. IF 'Performing', THEN delegate.
learnMore.mindsetTip: The PM is a facilitator, not a commander.

process.title: Manage Budget
process.primeDirective: Baseline early, track often with EVM.
process.deepDive: Control costs using Earned Value Management (EVM) metrics.
process.veteranTip: Budgeting is about transparency. If you're 20% over, tell the sponsor *why* and show the recovery plan immediately.

learnMore.logic: IF CPI < 1.0, THEN analyze root cause and update Risk Register.
learnMore.mindsetTip: Protect the baseline, manage the variance.

business.title: Manage Compliance
business.deepDive: Integrate audits and quality checks into the project schedule.
business.veteranTip: I treat compliance as a 'Gate.' If it doesn't pass, we don't move. It saves millions in rework later.

learnMore.logic: IF regulations change, THEN assess scope impact immediately.
learnMore.mindsetTip: Proactive compliance is cheaper than reactive legal fees.

formulas.name: CPI (Cost Performance Index)
formulas.scenario: EV is $200,000, but the team has already spent (AC) $250,000.
formulas.veteranInsight: Spending $1 to get $0.80 of value is a systemic failure. Check for scope creep.
